name: Bogs Classic Casual Nylon Boots - Women's
description:
Light and water-resistant with a foot hugging inner that offers rebound and cushioning. Simply put, this is the boot to embrace wet weather.Bloom™ EVA footbeds are algae based and help clean polluted water sources.DuraFresh™ natural odour control.Grippy rubber outsole.
